Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, south of the Richland Grape Orchard.
Room.LongDescription: The large Chateau Richland Grape Orchard provides for nearly all the grapes which go into the production of the various wines and juices that the Winery makes. On the south side of the road is the Deep Freeze Storage Facility where cold items may be preserved without worrying about decay or melting. The facility is maintained using dry ice, a relatively modern approach to cold preservation.
